name: Brenda Blair
text:
Great place to get light fixtures, very knowledgeable associates to help you
And they carry almost everything electrical

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback!

name: David Terry
text: Mark, James and Terry are very knowledgeable and friendly. I like being able to send a picture or an order by text to James and know it will be right and ready when I arrive. If he doesn't have something, he orders it, or finds it locally and has it delivered to my job site. Keeping me working. I don't just feel like a dollar sign when going in, it's like visiting friends. Thanks Mathis for keeping South Baldwin County LIT!

resp.text: We see we overlooked Thanking you for your rating.  Please accept our apology for the tardiness.  Thank you for  your feedback.  We appreciate the informative comment and look forward to serving you again.

name: Frank C
text: Great customer service. I rolled in at 4:55 looking like a schmoe and Katie provided excellent customer service. She processed my order with a great attitude even though I kept her there until 5:30. Great selection and prices to boot!

name: Debbie Steiner
text: Customer service is great! Down side, our order that was suppose to arrive in three weeks actually took three months. Recommend purchasing in stock items if 90 day lead time doesn't fit your schedule.

resp.text: Thank you for your input, your manufacturer was having some delivery issues at the time.

name: Laura Wilson
text: I have been using Mathes Electric for YEARS and never had anything but great service and products, both commercially at my business #AdvancedTransmission and personally at my home.  I highly recommended them and wouldn't use anyone else.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and the review of our business. We hold our customers opinion here at Mathes very highly and look forward to continuing doing business, thanks again.

name: Marcia Mathis
text: Friendly helpful staff ... found exactly what I needed quickly.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.

name: Arrow Networking (Carl)
text: Helpful counter people.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your business, and the kind review.

name: Bo Klug
text: Curtis is an A+ counter sales Manager !

resp.text: We always appreciate feedback on how we are doing.  I will pass it along.

name: Bonnie Shoultz
text:
I have not had the pleasure to shop at Lush personally. However, after watching Tim’s videos and his heartfelt love and concern for not only his business, but, other small businesses during this time of uncertainty, I would just love to hug him and pledge my business to Lush!
Tim, your heart is absolutely precious and your Mother would be so proud ❣️

resp.text: OMG... you brought tears to my eyes...  it's been such a hard 12 months for so many...  your kindness to take the time to send this is very much appreciated.   Tim

name: Caryn Janecky
text: Highly recommend their class! So fun!

name: Kathleen Kerns
text: I am not local and needed two plant arrangements delivered to two different locations after the loss of a loved one.  I called, and Susan was so helpful - she shared with me in clear detail what my available options were.  Ultimately, I entrusted her with the selection and design.  The recipients sent pictures of the delivered arrangements, and they were exactly what I had in mind!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your positive experience.  We are a small local business and are very grateful for you and so happy you are pleased.

name: cross nic
text: The Lilys bloomed today!!!!!!   I live 1,300 miles away and they helped get an arrangement to my mom. It was beautiful and spectacular and made her smile like she deserves, especially on Mother's Day. THANK YOU

name: Carolyn Davis
text: Gorgeous flower arrangements and the best place to stop for one of a kind gifts.  The candles smell delicious.

name: Sonya Bumpers
text:
All of my floral designs, aromatic candles and delivery experiences with Lush Home and Garden Event Center have been nothing but exceptional.
I live in Birmingham and have placed orders over the phone including my payments and the experience was without fault.
Tim Burt, and his amazing staff have gone above and beyond in surprising my Aunts,  Uncles, Girlfriends and Father.
Thanks, for phenomenal customer service and all the love that is put into each order and delivery.
My Aunt still smiles about the day of her delivery arrived, the  arrangements was beautiful of course, however she seemed more delighted in the handsome youngman in his apron bring the delivery, this made her day.
When your business is so designed to bring joy and delight to others, it is indeed a pleasure when that if filled to the utmost and the purchaser feels good also.
To the Lush Management and Staff.
I Wish You Enough!

Sonya Bumpers

resp.text: Wow!   Thank you Sonya... your support over the years means more than you will ever know and taking the time to review us means a lot..

name: Brock Killingsworth
text: Lush is the best. Always friendly, always great flowers, always fantastic gift ideas.

name: Alexandrea West
text: Lush is my favorite place to shop for everything from candles, to home lighting, to thoughtful and unique gifts. The service is always above and beyond the norm. I appreciate their creative input and always trust that anything I go to them for will be above and beyond my expectations.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us!!  So pleased that you are happy with your experience and we look forward to working with you in the future... we also admire your fabulous work...  Thanks again...

name: Bobbi Sue Thomas
text: Lush is such a breathe of fresh air in Midtown Mobile. The owner, Tim, is so personable and always so kind. I can always find the perfect gift for any occasion and they always go the extra mile to wrap it beautifully. Cannot say enough good things about this store. It is wonderful!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for saying these wonderful things...    As a locally owned business we couldn't make it without the support of our regular customers.  We try hard to go the extra mile with fresh flowers on our gift wrap and walking folks to their car... because we actually love what we do!  So grateful you took the time to rate us!

name: Henry Hudson
text: Thank you so much for arranging a last minute beautiful bouquet and delivering it so quickly with just a phone call!! My best friend loves it and it made her smile when her birthday wasn’t going so great.

name: Sarah Baxter
text: Thank you LUSH!! I had a horrible experience from ordering flowers from FTD.com. I purchased $100 bouquet for my cousin, and they sent a dreadful arrangement (that looked like it came from Walmart). I immediately called LUSH to see if they could send the flowers my cousin deserved. I am still in awe of the arrangement Tim and his team created. I will never make the mistake of using anyone other than LUSH again.

resp.text: Sarah... Thank you so much for taking the time to review us.  We are so grateful we were able to please you and look forward to working with you again...

name: Susan Cook
text: Incredible work with an amazing staff!! Perfectly located in downtown Mobile but flexible with punctual deliveries. 10/10 would recommend!

name: Luke Boothe
text:
I’ve been to Lush numerous times for flowers and gifts and have never had anything that wasn't
nothing but beautiful. Their arrangements are the best in Mobile. The staff is super friendly.
KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK LUSH!!!

resp.text: Thank you Luke for such a great review!

name: Ashley Gunter
text: Absolutely one of the most elegant and beautiful shops in Mobile,Al.

resp.text: What a wonderful thing to say.  We will continue to try and live up to your praise!!   Thank you for taking the time to review us!!

name: Jillian Rosandich
text: LUSH is a beautifully curated space and such a joy to browse (I could spend hours!), especially thanks to the luxe scented candles and floral arrangements. Tim, the owner, is so kind and really knows his stuff. This is a true midtown destination and a must-stop shop for anyone that loves home decor.

resp.text: Oh My Goodness!  Thank you so much for taking the time to express this .  It means so much to me and my team.  As a local business we work hard to be a place everyone enjoys shopping. We want to be known as the "where did you get that?" store.   Again your kind words are much appreciated... Tim

name: Courtney Mcdonald
text: I love this place sooo much!! It’s the perfect place for gifts, or home decor! And the customer service is over the top!! I came in the Friday before Christmas for a last minute gift, and everyone so nice, especially for it to have been as busy as it was! I felt like just hanging out for a while and chatting because everyone was just so friendly!! The gift set I purchased was already wrapped really cute but they took the extra time to “spruce” up the bag even more! It’s the little things like that, that make shopping experiences so much better than other places. This is now my go-to spot for gifts and such!! Thanks Lush!! I have been sure to tell everyone about this little hidden gem!

resp.text: Wow!! Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review.  I have a great staff and we love what we do.  This review will make everyone’s day!!

name: Jennifer Pool
text: What a wonderful experience! Excellent customer service, amazing flower arrangements and a beautiful store full of wonderful gifts!! I cannot say enough about Lush - Tim and Jonathan were just the best! Lush is a jewel - you must visit!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us and we are so grateful for your kind words...  Next time you are in we want to treat you to one of our Coastal Candles   on us!!!  Thanks again.... Tim

name: Boyd McGehee
text: This store is a gem for the state of Alabama! One of a kind.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review .  And such an amazing compliment...because i know you are well traveled and to give us such high praise we are very grateful..

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

text: I went to a boarding school in the area and Lush is my go to place for corsages for school dances. The ones I got always looked MILES better than those of the same price from other local florists, and the people working the desk and making the corsages will talk to you and look at pictures of your dates dress and your tux and discuss your color and design options.

resp.text: Thank you. So happy you were pleased!

I would've understood if he would've just at least "Hi, how are you" but nothing was said! So we politely walked out! When we really wanted to purchase things!

resp.text: I saw you look through the windows... I checked our cameras and never saw you enter the store... Would love to speak with ... Thanks  Tim

resp.text: When the arrangement was delivered yesterday it was fresh and gorgeous. We received a call today from the funeral home that the heat had wilted them. text:
Have used Lighting and Lamp on three homes and am in the process of making it four. I am looking forward to working with Annie and their staff again.
Follow up:
I should have updated this review before now.
Annie and the folks at Lighting and Lamp have done it again. The house is complete, furniture is being delivered and the lighting fixtures look great.
The simple fixtures in the basement and attic are inexpensive and functional. The ceiling lights and ceiling fans are exactly what we were looking for. The exterior lighting (flood lights and porch lights) are wonderful. The flood lights illuminate the entire yard while the porch lights create a warm and beautiful entrance.
Thanks Annie!

text: Awesome furniture and lighting. It’s a little pricey but great quality. The only downside to this location is that it is quite small with not much to see on display. There weren’t many employees available to offer assistance or answer questions. I highly recommend visiting the multi level Nashville location if you want a better experience.

name: SantanaTyree
text:
SAVE YOURSELF THE TIME AND DO NOT GO HERE. See below:

The customer service was absolutely awful. If you are looking for a warm, inviting environment, RH at the Summit isn’t the place whatsoever. You will be completely disappointed if you receive the treatment we did. You will especially be disappointed and appalled if you had just left Bassett Furniture in Hoover where they took the time to do the following: cultivate a relationship, show you around their showroom, listen to what your needs are, and sit down to customize furniture based on your specifications. For lack of words, the feeling that my husband and I received at RH: “We are RH, our products speak for themselves, so we are not going to do our job at all. We are not going to try to educate them on our selections/options. I am not leaving my computer to assess their needs. If they want something, they’ll ask me then buy it.” The ONLY information we were given was about looking online and a RH book when we got ready to leave because I couldn’t take it any longer. Not once did the lady offer to look at fabrics with us, to go over color selections, discuss what their process was, etc. (We were wanting custom furniture for a spec home and this was stated.) When I asked a question, the response was very much short and NON-informative, I was told to look online which defeats the entire purpose of going in store. The lack of willingness to assist us has left a LASTING impression. Because of that, we are HAPPY to spend MORE elsewhere because of superb customer service. There are numerous competitors; a product can easily be mimicked, customer service can’t.

name: Vicki Dukes
text: I had been looking for a table and chairs for my kitchen. Found what I wanted online. I wasn’t ready to order, though, without seeing it. My husband and I made the 1.5 hour trip to Bham. I had talked to Loren on the phone before I came. When we got there, Loren helped us. She was very professional and knew what she was talking about. It was a very good experience.

name: Brian Panos
text: Nice stuff but pricey!

name: Jennifer Jones
text: Thank God for Rebekah!! I visited RH for the first time on 10/26 during my quick little birthday getaway. This was actually my first time EVER visiting an RH store. Rebekah greeted me enthusiastically. She was so nice and personable as she engaged with me and answered any and all questions that I had. I really enjoyed chatting with her. She was very cheerful, bubbly, and helpful. I really didn't sense the same vibe from the other few associates I saw standing around in the store. The guy who greeted me at the door was also warm ams and inviting. Thank you soooo much Rebekah for being so friendly and kind!!! Little did she know, I had just lost one of my closest friends to Covid-19 who was buried just that Saturday before. So, I was out and about trying to enjoy my birthday in spite of. This was my first visit to the Summit, and Rebekah was one the best experiences I had that day. She really need to spend time over at Saks and Seasons 52 training some of the sales associates and waiters on good customer service and how to demonstrate it. God bless you Rebekah!!

text: Bought a cloud with terrible cushions that don’t hold their fill just after a single use.   There is no way a cushion should have to be disconnected and fluffed every single time.    Now they told me that it would cost $1400 to replace them to cushions  that will hold their shape.   Extremely disappointed with a multi million dollar company that can’t remedy a simple problem.

name: Susan Hanley
text: If you could assign less than one star I certainly would. I just spent over 20 minutes in Restoration Hardware at the Summit waiting for someone to wait on me (or even speak to me) and obviously they do not need my business because they did not even acknowledge me although they looked over at me several times. There were three sales associates and at the very beginning they were each with someone but then one became available when her customer left and she immediately disappeared to the back of the store. Again keep in mind they all saw me and said nothing and when the sales rep  finally came back out from wherever she went, another person  walked into the store and she asked if she could help them. Wow! I wanted to purchase a king bedroom suite I saw in their catalog which would have been well over a $10k purchase but I guess they do not need my business. I’m taking it somewhere that someone will actually acknowledge you  walked into their store.

text: They are nice friendly people there

name: renee r
text: Nice place

name: Austin Park
text: Very helpful. Worked with me till I got what I needed with a smile the whole time.

name: Chris Pearce
text: The staff knows their inventory! They are eager to help as soon as you enter.

name: Kyle Brown
text: Basic electrical supplies. Does not stock as much as downtown location. Quasi friendly counter people.

name: Jason Nicklaus
text: This is a great home decor and design shop! Many people know about Cullman Cabinet also located here but few are aware of The Added Touch which has furniture, lighting, and so much more. The staff are always friendly and willing to help you find that unique item or just let you look around at all the displays they have created.

name: Mike Schafer
text: Best shop in town!!

name: Amy Hancock
text: Love their selection on furniture, lighting. They have products you just can't find in any store.

name: Amy Hancock
text: Beautiful selection on home furnishings! Very friendly and helpful staff.

name: Sheri Rutherford
text: Very beautiful place and super friendly ladies to help with anything you need

name: Tela Moreland
text: There are some beautiful things here.

name: Elaine Cole
text: Always great service and selection. Wouldn't go anywhere else for lighting!

name: Bobby Phillips
text: Good selection

name: Sue Stephens
text: Gexpro has a convenient location to me. They had the part I needed in stock. They provided excellent customer service! Thanks, Gexpro! You will be my go-to from here on for electrical supplies.

resp.text: Sue, we are so pleased to hear about your positive experience at our branch! Thank you for the feedback and for the 5-star review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Andrew Ohlinger
text: Great electrical and lighting supply. Very helpful counter staff. They also have a great stock of Klein and Southwire tools!

resp.text: Andrew, thanks so much for the 5-star review! We really appreciate you taking the time to write a review and your continued business.

name: Paul Goodridge
text: Great place to work and great boss to work with.  Friendly staff and great services.

resp.text: Thanks, Paul, for reviewing the branch. We appreciate it!

name: trent flowers
text: A little SLOW on ordering

resp.text: We apologize you had a negative experience with us with ordering. We strive to serve our customers at the highest level and hope we can connect with you to see how we can do better. Please reach out to our branch manager at (256) 774-1651 so we can correct the problem.

name: Bradley Dortch
text: Love this store and all of its staff!! I frequent the store several times a month and everyone is always so welcoming and extremely helpful each and every time that I’m looking for pieces to decorate my home with. If your looking for quality pieces, tons of selections, the friendliest staff then look no further than Stock & Trade. I’m definitely a customer for life!!

name: Jessica Bahouth
text: We love Stock and Trade. The customer service is incredible. We work with a particular fabulous consultant, John, who has helped us elevate the look of our home. He is very knowledgeable and has wonderful taste. The entire staff is wonderful and friendly. I didnt feel pressured or hovered over. The prices are fair and the inventory is beautiful. John truly goes above and beyond to make sure we get exactly what we want. Even if he has to order it! wish I could give them 6 stars!

name: Denise Upton
text: John Herrington Interior Designer for Stock and Trade helped me redecorate my condo in Orange Beach. He does an awesome job and is great with mixing colors and accessories. He also helped me decide on a rug for my living room as well as new decorative pillows and a new coffee table. He is excellent to work with, makes quick and accurate decisions and responded to my phone calls or texts. I have used his decor services before Stock and Trade and will use him again in the future. I highly recommend him.

name: Candace Thompson
text: Stock and Trade is by far my favorite spot to purchase for my personal home and for my Designing Company. Sales Associate John Herrington is so amazing to deal with, he goes above and beyond to find what I’m looking for and helps me put things together for the perfect look. I can’t say enough wonderful things about this place. I highly recommend!

name: Pam Breedlove
text: What a fabulous find! A friend told me about the store so I decided to come and look for accessories for our beach house. I was pleasantly surprised to find such a well designed space with beautiful options. The vignettes were well thought out and appointed; a much more sophisticated look than the Destin store. While shopping I found out that John Herrington was responsible! He had helped me at his old job with an apartment for our son in Los Angeles. Great eye and sincere service. Plan to be back at this store to work with John on our future projects!

name: Sheena Mincy
text:
My husband and I came into Stock & Trade after loosing our home in Hurricane Sally. From the moment we entered the store, the service we received was incredible. We explained our situation to John [Herrington] and he went above and beyond to help us make our house into a home again. John’s knowledge of interior decorating is second to none. He’s now one of our trusted friends and continues to follow up w/ our family.
We’ve been back to the store a number of times, since our initial visit and everyone there has been extremely helpful and welcoming. Especially, when we bring our 5 y/o. Karley is always great about playing with her.
S&T is definitely our go to for home furnishings!

name: Jason Lawrence
text:
The kind of customer service that makes you cringe.

Edit:  Nah I am good, no need to reach out to you, I walked in the store last week. I said I was just looking, I was asked 5x before we left if we needed help finding things and many times sales was trying to strike up conversation.  Just looking means that I want to look and not be harassed.

resp.text: Jason, We hate to see this.  Could you please call or send more details about your experience to SpanishFort@StockandTrade.com.  Thank you!

name: Kalyn Miller
text: This team is amazing! They make you feel comfortable in the store and goes above and beyond to help you create a beautiful space!!

name: Gerald Smith
text:
My wife and I visited this store Tuesday March 30 at 1:00pm. Strolled through the entire store without not one hello from any employee.
I don't understand why you would spend so much money on advertising to get floor traffic when you don't even acknowledge a potential customer?

resp.text:
Gerald,
We hate to hear about this experience.  We are looking at video to see where the breakdown occurred because that is not typical.   We do provide a non-pressure environment and received a complaint just last week from a customer because he felt we asked if he had any questions or needed any assistance too many times in his opinion, but in this case low pressure was taken too far.   If you could provide any more details via email to support@stockandtrade.com so that we can look into it further would be greatly appreciated.  I sincerely apologize and hope that you will give us another chance to show you what we have to offer.

name: Addison Williams
text: Beautiful store and friendly staff

name: Larry Johnson
text: We lucked out with this company. Scott worked us into their very busy schedule, and very friendly, and efficient. The guys laid 400 square feet of floor tile. And did an excellent job. Would definitely recommend .

name: Debbie Dunaway
text: Great selection to help design interior and exterior of your new home or renovation.

name: Mark Boackle
text: Fantastic selection and design ability combined with superior service.

name: david hudson
text: Usually find what you need there. Helpful people.

name: Noeli Moreno
text: Good stuf for your home

name: Crystal Cooley
text: Beautiful stuff

name: Johnny Winters
text: Nice

name: susan evans
text: Rude rude rude. Didn’t say thank you for your business or come back to see us…:(… very disappointed!!!

name: Pamela Sanders
text: Like to visit and get ideas

name: Joseph Johnson
text: The store is well-kept and apt for the hoity toity for sure but, only those that wish to decorate for neutral, bland palettes. Perfect for the suburban Xerox copy family looking to "blend-in" not for an urban stylistic leaning preference.

name: Gecki
text: Urban Home Market is a wonderful resource for great selection of quality furniture and accessories at reasonable prices.  After shopping for dining tables all over Birmingham, we finally bought one at Urban Home and are very happy with it.  Shannon was knowledgeable and helpful, and the delivery guys were also great.  Thank you, Urban Home!

name: Melanie O'Keefe
text: I went in to buy some chairs. I asked the price of a chair and purchased 2. They delivered the wrong chairs. Luckily I had taken a picture of the chair. After a long back and forth the sales person had sold me the wrong chairs. They said they would honor the price and order me the chairs as they didn’t have any in the warehouse. They said it would be 8 weeks. I called 7 weeks later to check on the status. Apparently they never placed the order. Its beyond belief how much they screwed up. They lost a good customer forever!

name: Erin
text: During the pandemic it was difficult to shop for furniture. Urban Home was incredibly helpful and professional. They had a beautiful selection and went out of their way to make it easier for us during such a trying time to move.

name: Dianne Scott
text: Excellent service, good selection of furniture and good prices.

name: Michael Garrett
text: Neat place. A lot of stylish home goods. My wife enjoys the store very much. A friendly, helpful staff. Prices seem a bit high to me, just an opinion.

name: jim lawrence
text: Employee westley is a theif

name: Vicki Everett
text:
As you enter the door of Urban Home, a warm welcome is awaiting you with talented designers ready to create a new home environment for your
needs! We are the receipent of a lovely new room in our home designed by Urban Home and spend many peaceful hours enjoying it! Stop by today and enjoy their Thanksgiving and holiday decorating ideas and head home with new ideas and new decorating items to add more warmth and love to your home !

name: Tommy Barrows
text: Such a large selection. Beautiful pieces. Wonderful staff. Don't miss the close out room in the back right corner for deep discount deals. Ask for Drew, he's one of the buyers and decorators, fabulous!

name: Caroline Lowe
text: Urban Home is the epitome of southern elegance. The staff is incredibly helpful and welcoming. Each visit is a new experience and like coming into your own home. I would recommend Urban Home Market to anyone who wants to bring Southern Class into their home.

name: Lorie Myrick
text:
I love this store! Emily has helped us design our home! We could not be more pleased with the furniture selection, the service, and the kindness and knowledge of all the employees .
It is a place worth your time to visit!

name: Deby Tooker
text: Nice living room offerings but I was disappointed by the lack of bedroom furniture. The staff was friendly and the store was clean. This is a good place to shop for living room furniture and accessories.

name: Josh Hall
text:
The Urban team are very professional, knowledge, courteous and a hell of alot of fun!!!
Emily has an incredible taste level and we are very excited how she is putting our new home together!

name: Amy Baker
text: This place, located at Lee Branch by Hobby Lobby, has consistently impressive interior design pieces such as tables, chairs, mirrors, lamps, chandeliers, etc. —-some styles rustic and some more contemporary —Also, this store has ever-changing home decor knick knacks such as pillows, wall hangings, tableware, etc. Has appropriately helpful associates who are not pushy.

name: Allan Scott
text: Not one person who was working in the store even spoke. I've read this about the store before I experienced it myself. Beautiful furniture and artwork. I'll be buying my furniture where I live in Buckhead, GA. Missed opportunity for this store.

name: Wanda Campbell
text: Very beautiful furniture and accessories. Great people that know their business. LOVE this store!!!

name: dawn reeves
text: From chandeliers to armoires, amazing furniture and more, Urban Home has absolutely everything to furnish your home.  And, the service... Second to none!

name: Remy Helu
text: Great product good helpful people give them a visit.

name: Ashley Truc Do
text: I'm highly recommend this place to anyone who's shopping new furnitures for your homes....such a well trained, professional staffs and great choices of furnitures to choose from.

name: Gwen Dennis
text: Love the store and staff ! Highly recommend this store if you are shopping for new furniture.

name: k arrington
text: I could fill my whole house with this gorgeous furniture! And accessories!

name: Selena Spates
text: I love the home selection  it's a very inviting environment.

name: Karen Johns
text: Unique and stylish furniture. Locally owned.

name: Pamela Sanders
text: Awesome

name: Dave V
text: Very nice furniture and accessory collection.

name: Shasta Fayme
text: This place screams "wine and Xanax soccer mom"

name: Haley Spates Houston
text: Such a beautiful store with amazing home items!!

name: Beverly Hughes
text: I was not acknowledged as a potential customer looking to buy furniture.

name: MaLana Carlee
text: Awesome place

name: Kris Findlay
text: Nice place!

name: Cindy McRee
text: Lovely store

name: Michael Shabani
text: Very unique

name: Rebecca Nichols
text: Awesome merchandise and shopping experience.

name: Wendy Higginbotham
text: Unique items

name: Samantha K. McDaniel
text: This review is for The Floor Store - Made me a great price on some Shaw laminate flooring.  They went above and beyond in getting me a quality product and fast delivery.  In these uncertain delivery times, they managed to get my order in 10 days.  Really assisted in meeting my project deadline.  Friendly and knowledgeable staff.   If I have a future need, I know where I'm going to shop!  Thanks

name: Jesse Roney
text: Very knowledgeable staff they had exactly what I needed to fix my busted pressure regulator and the cost was very agreeable.

name: Elizabeth Tucker
text: They were very helpful and had the specialty bulbs we needed.

name: Caren Edwards
text: Very professional. Great service. Beautiful showroom.

name: Delphine Lee
text: Oh how I love this place. Prices can not be beat & customer service is awesome

name: Rodney Hammonds
text: Jimmy Fowler and his team are friendly helpful people who are extremely knowledgeable in electrical and lighting.. My family and place of business put our trust in this company.. Highly recommended

name: Jeanette Clanahan
text: Good store clerk.

name: Eddie Johnston
text: Good service

name: Ryan Rayment
text: Helpful and knowledgeable

name: Andrew Huggins
text: Helpful staff and a good number of samples available

name: Mario Armenta
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent attention

(Original)
Exelente atencion

name: George Brengelman
text: Very informative and helpful staff. You can buy light fixtures just about anywhere, the service that this business provides is priceless. I highly recommend Lighting Concepts.

resp.text: George, thank you for your kind review.  We certainly try extra hard to make sure we exceed our customers expectations.

name: Cindy Bankston
text: We really love Lighting Concepts. They have so many different items to choose from -ceiling fans, lamps, hanging pendants and more. You can't ask for a greater bunch of folks to help you to come up with all your design needs.  I am so happy with my recent purchases. THANKS!!

resp.text: Thanks Cindy.  It is so nice to have great customers like yourself.  Let us know anytime we can be of service to you.  Customers like you make all of the hard work we do very worthwhile.   Jimmy Adcock

name: Maryann Brady
text: Customers service was great friendly people merchandise was good quality i would recommend this store for all your lighting needs also has some nice wall decor.

resp.text: Thank you, Maryann.  We always try our best to meet and exceed our customers expectation.   Let us know if we can be of any further service.

name: Kristel Brewis
text: Last year we built a new house and I worked with Nancy and her husband to choose and purchase all our lighting.  I visited several competitor's show rooms in the Birmingham area and found some too small and some too large (overwhelming) for my tastes.  Lighting Concepts in Trussville was a perfect fit.  We met several times and Nancy was exceptionally patient with me to make sure I truly loved everything I picked.  We spent hours looking at options!  Her expert knowledge of exactly how much lighting each room required and the necessary size of each fixture in proportion to the room was a breath of fresh air.  I can't imagine trying to figure all of that out on my own.  She was very attentive to my personal preferences and tastes.  Once everything was purchased and delivered, they stayed involved to make sure everything worked correctly and that I was happy.  I have lived in my new home for three months now and I still love every lighting choice she helped me make!

resp.text: Thanks Kristel for the review and your comments regarding our service.  We really do try to make this experience this enjoyable for all of our customers.  We greatly appreciate the opportunity to work with you on the lighting for your new home.  Enjoy!!!  Jimmy & Nancy Adcock

name: David Seidel
text: Good store.  They always take care of me and do their best to help me find what I need.

name: Donna McGuffie
text:
I purchased new LED light bulbs for ny kitchen after they recommending them.. what a difference!!
They have a beautiful selection in their showroom for all your lighting needs. I came home with two absolutely beautiful lamps!

name: Kasey Cardwell
text: Jimmy and Cay with Lighting Concepts in Trussville were so awesome to work with as first time home builders! They were prompt, informative, and easy to work with! We could not have been happier with our experience and with the products that we received for our home!

resp.text: Thanks, Kasey!  The pleasure is ours!

name: Ronald Crumpton
text: Had the pleasure of meeting Christian a salesman there. He worked his tail off trying to please my wife  answering all her questions and showing all the different lighting avalible there.  Great guy, we will purchase again there.

resp.text: Mr. Crumpton, we are thankful for your business.  Come back and see us again!

name: Janara Grayson
text: Walked in ready to purchase a ceiling fan and was not greeted at all then after looking around waiting for them to finish with customer the worker then walked pass us and still didn't acknowledge we were even in the store.. I Guess we was Invisible to her!!!!! So for the reviews that said they were helpful Today I found out they was not True at all we look in the intire store and nothing was said.

name: Gummy Bear
text: Very helpful and honest people. Definitely a go to place for all your lighting needs.

name: Angela Tate
text: The lady that helped me was super nice and went out of her way to help me find lighting for our new home.

name: M. Alexander
text: Wonderful staff and amazing product line

name: christi mullins
text: Beautiful selection and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks for your review.  We really do appreciate your business.  Let us know if we can ever be of assistance.

name: Sherlinda Collins
text: Good, nice merchandise, helpful.

name: Melissa Harman
text: Cynthia was amazing with assisting us in lighting and fans options for our new home

name: Travis Howard
text: They are always extremely helpful no matter if you are buying a specialty light bulb or buying fixtures for a project. They always go out of there way to help with any challenge or track down a hard to find fixture. I would recommend working with them always.

resp.text: Thank you Travis! We appreciate your kind feedback and your loyal business!

name: Peggy Serio
text: I have always had excellent service at Inline Lighting. My most recent experience was the same. Riley assisted me and was most helpful. He was knowledgeable and courteous and I was able to purchase everything I needed for my project with his help. I highly recommend this business!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind and encouraging words, Peggy! We are so happy to have you as a repeat customer. I'll make sure Riley knows that you were very pleased. Thanks!

name: BamaDave G
text: We didn't really get any help. When we told someone we were building a house, she told us our builder normally works with a specific person who was by appointment only (okay fair enough) but then just kinda proceeded to tell us she wasn't available. Didn't offer to really help us or show us anything and didn't seem to be able to record anything we liked without this other person. Unlikely to be doing business here.

resp.text: David, we are so sorry you had a bad experience in our showroom! We would love the opportunity to make this right. Please provide an email address or phone # we can contact you directly with or please call us and ask to speak with Beth or Ed, our showroom managers 256-533-2851. You can also email them at ejaco@inlinelighting.com or beth@inlinelighting.com. Again, we apologize for your negative experience!

name: Rory Amos
text: Great service and amazing amount of choices

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Rory!

name: Bailey Fawcett
text: Had absolutely the best experience in there today! My designer, Ashley, was SO kind and attentive. I know I did not give the clearest description of what I wanted but she figured it. I couldn’t be more pleased! I am so excited for my furniture to come!

resp.text: Hi Bailey, thank you so much for your feedback! Ashley is a huge asset to our team in Hoover. She is so knowledgeable and professional. So glad to hear of your experience and we can't wait to hear of how your home turns out! Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Tava Chandler
text: I recently needed to furnish several rooms in our new home. Ashley White came to my home and listened to my needs, measured my spaces, and helped me to identify the pieces needed for each room. Ashley was very knowledgeable and helped make the process of selecting finishes and fabrics enjoyable. Her assistance helped me to be confident in my choices.

resp.text:
Hello Tava!  Thank you for taking the time to share insight regarding your experience with designer Ashley White at the Birmingham Design Center. Ashley is an exceptional designer who actively listens to understand her clients’ needs. From there, Ashley helps them navigate the many custom options while narrowing down on the functional solutions that reflect their style and design preference. Thank you so much for your 5-Star Review. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your experience and hope that your furnishings bring you joy for many years to come!
- Birmingham Design Center

name: Cynthia Parker
text: My experience at Ethan Allen has been extremely stress free and pleasant. This is due primarily to the friendly, yet professional service of Ashley White.  Her eye for design along with her helpful guidance (actually visiting the space in my home) has made the purchase of my new bed room décor a cinch! Looking forward to purchasing more excellent quality furniture as well as working with Ashley. I appreciate the time she put into making this experience a great one!

resp.text:
Hi Cynthia! Thank You for providing insight about your experience at the Birmingham Design Center. We are so glad that you all decided to give Ethan Allen a try at earning your business. Professional Designer Ashley White actively listens to her client’s needs and concerns in order to tailor solutions that are both functional and aesthetically appealing. Ashley is ecstatic that you enjoyed the design process in entirety. Cynthia, Thank You the 5-Star Rating and for choosing us to be a part of your home furnishing experience!
-Birmingham Design Center

name: Alexa Mallard
text: Ashley was a great help in finding the perfect bed to compliment our EA furniture we bought twenty years ago. She was creative and a great communicator who  helped me visualize a new look. The Hoover store was clean and had several things in place to ensure safety and health during the pandemic.

resp.text: Hi Alexa, thank you for your review. Ashley is a great asset to our team in Birmingham. Safety has always been a focus for Ethan Allen, and especially during this current challenge we are committed to keeping our staff and clients safe.  Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Mary Neil
text: Ashley was very helpful in the showroom and drawing layouts with pricing.  She reached out, was good at communicating, sharing her cell and email. Ashley made it easy and quick working on our sectional, developing the final scheme and completing pricing for our order.  We are very pleased.

resp.text: Hi Mary, thank you so much for the feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with Ashley at our Birmingham Design Center. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Elizabeth Reed
text: Remodeling a kitchen after a house fire is stressful, to say the least.  Our kitchen table and chairs came from Ethan Allen nearly 20 years ago so I went back to them to see if they had counter hight stools that would coordinate with existing furniture.  Ashley White knew exactly what I was looking for.  She suggested the perfect leg and finish based on a photo of my table and chairs.  Our new stools were just delivered and they are perfection!  It's always a pleasure to shop in Ethan Allen.  Thank you Ashley, for also making it fun!

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, thank you for such great feedback on your experience with Ethan Allen. We are so glad you were able to work with Ashley and she took such great care of you. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: john placey
text: We have enjoyed owning Ethan Allen furniture and furnishings over the decades!  Some pieces like our dining room chairs and table still look and feel brand new even though purchased in the early 1970s!  Their staff is always friendly and helpful!  A bit pricey but we have found that you truly get to enjoy what you paid for!!!

name: Ronald Payne
text: After searching many stores, we found our perfect dining room table at our local Ethan Allen and it was on sale. The table had two leaves which would be needed to host our large family group for Thanksgiving. The sales lady was most helpful and promised that it would be delivered before Thanksgiving only about six weeks away. We were kept informed every step on the way and our table arrived four days prior to Thanksgiving. The leaves are a little hard to get in and out but that should get better with more use. We love the table!

resp.text: Ronald, I am so happy to hear about your experience! We love when the process goes smoothly. I know you will enjoy your table for many Thanksgivings to come. Thank you for reaching out to let us know, we appreciate it.

name: Catherine Benefield
text: The whole experience with Ethan Allen has been pleasant and productive. Designer Kelley Horton guided me through the process of selecting furniture (sofa, 2 chairs, ottomans) and fabrics. The furniture was delivered by professionals who NOT ONCE bumped a wall or door frame. They carefully set up the furniture and carted away the wrappings. The designer then brought paint samples and assisted in selecting a paint color for the walls. From start to finish, I was treated with professionalism and courtesy. The furniture is well made, beautiful in my home, and most importantly, comfortable. Will I purchase from Ethan Allen on Hwy. 150 in Hoover again? Absolutely.

resp.text: Hi Catherine! Thank you for taking the time to write about your wonderful experience at our Hoover location. We appreciate it very much! We are pleased to hear that Kelley could make designing your home a breeze and know it MUST look beautiful. Thank you for also pointing out how amazing our delivery team was; they are quite the asset to Ethan Allen! We hope you enjoy your beautiful pieces for many years to come and appreciate your business very much.

name: Amy Rickles
text: Ashely did a great job of helping us pick a style of furniture, wood accents, and fabric. Well worth the time and money spent. Would highly recommend.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Amy. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. Ashley is a huge asset to our Birmingham team!

Cheers,

Ethan Allen

name: Cameron al Shaqar
text: Kelly, at Ethan Allen, was so fantastic!! She took so much time out for me & assisted me with choosing the fabric for my cornices and curtains. I love my new curtains!!! The reason I rated 3 stars is because Ethan Allen is way over priced I found the same rug I was going to buy from Ethan Allen at RH for much less. I understand Ethan Allen has nice fabrics but I've seen much nicer for far less.

resp.text: Cameron, thank you so much for the feedback! I am so thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your new curtains! Custom curtains can be a big project, I am so happy that Kelly was able to partner with you and design and implement something you love.

name: Pat Ford
text: Great purchasing and service experience! Ashley greeted us warmly when we arrived and quickly showed us what we were looking for and provided material samples that were perfect for our needs.  She made the whole process quick and easy.  The delivery guys were the best I have ever seen.  They  handled the new chairs and sofa with care and were careful to not damage our wood floor in moving the sofa into place.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review Pat! We're happy to hear everything went perfect during your delivery and that our team did an excellent job as well. Thanks for taking the time to write about us. We know Ashley appreciates your compliment as well!

name: Sherry Vaughn
text:
I have been buying Ethan Allen furniture for over 25 years because I know their furniture is a quality product and is timeless. But the thing that I have come to appreciate the most about Ethan Allen is their free design service. The designers know their business well and do a great job.
Kelley and Lauren with Hoover Ethan Allen have both been so helpful with my current home renovation.
I literally cannot praise Kelley Horton enough for how she has helped me to transform my home into a more modern and updated style utilizing what I currently have and incorporating new pieces to blend. She has spent countless hours  in helping me to choose the right pieces for my home including furniture, window treatments, rugs, artwork, bedding, and even down to the smallest decorative accent pieces. My home looks beautifully done with effortless design and functionality now.
The entire process from designing to delivery and installation has been very professional and I could not have asked for better.

resp.text: Thank you for this awesome review Sherry! It brings us so much joy to know how appreciated our brand is and that everyone on our team gives their all. Kelley goes above and beyond for her clients so we're glad to hear that you find her as special as we do! We know every detail matters and strive to ensure that our customer service is superb. Thank you again for all your kind words Sherry. Enjoy your newly renovated home!

name: Randy Mason
text: My wife and I were on vacation and staying at the hotel next door and decided to browse.  Ashley did such an awesome job reviewing and showing us the bed we looking for we bought one that day. We could have waited until we got home to Michigan but really liked the kind and genuine service that Ashley provided. That was our first time in an Ethan Allen store and we have now set up a home appointment back in Michigan. Thank you Ashley!!

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review, Randy! We are delighted to hear how welcoming Ashley was and greatly appreciate you stopping by. Thanks for joining the Ethan Allen family!

name: Emma Bolden
text: From browsing the store to having my pieces delivered, the entire process of buying furniture from the Ethan Allen in Hoover was a dream. We were greeted warmly as we came in the store, and designer Kelley Horton was extremely helpful and kind (and funny!). The delivery crew was prompt, respectful, and careful. An excellent experience all-around!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review of our Hoover location, Emma! We're happy to hear that Kelley made your experience with Ethan Allen a delightful one and that our delivery team took it one step further. We appreciate your business!

name: Alissa Hill
text: I would never purchase from Ethan Allen for anything that has to be made like furniture! We purchase a formal dining table and ten chairs to accompany it. Not only did our table show up with a large dent underneath (unfortunately we didn’t notice until the delivery men sped away) which they refused to do anything about but we placed the order in June 2019.... it’s now October 29 we still have no chairs. Their customer service department has been zero help with figuring out why. I would expect this from Wayfair  but when you spend over 6000.00 dollars for a table and chairs you expect far superior customer service. Guess I’ve learned my lesson and will forever stay out of Ethan Allen.

resp.text:
Alissa, I am so sorry to hear about your experience. I would love to look into it further and find a resolution but I am unfortunately not able to locate your order. Was it possibly purchased under another name? Or could you provide a phone number or order number? If you wouldn't mind emailing me at laura.smith@ethanallen.com I would love to see what we can do to make this situation right.

I look forward to working with you on a resolution.

Laura

name: Hazel Summerville

She was very patient and came up with great suggestions of things that would work well in our space and with the existing furniture we had.  At the end of the process we now have a room full of art that gives us a finished and professional look.  Thanks Ashley!

resp.text: Brian, thank you so much for the wonderful feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed Ashley's talent as much as we do!

text: I bought 6 dining chairs, picked out fabric and even ordered extra fabric to make pillows with.  I received excellent service!  Everything arrived on time in perfect condition. text: Ashley at Ethan Allen in Hoover was so patience  with my Aunt and I, she stayed late, called us back after hours and  did not hesitate when asked hard questions! Your prices were in line with fair market pricing giving us a high quality and a high design selection. Thanks for meeting all our needs!

resp.text: Becky, thank you so much for the feedback. We are thrilled to hear that Ethan Allen was just what you were looking for! We agree with you, Ashley is amazing! I'm happy to hear you adore her as much as we do!  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. We appreciate it!

name: Lisa Bice
text: Ashley White is wonderful to work with! - She is professional, intuitive and creative in her approach to pulling together furniture ideas, as well as accessories. I walked in to the store the first day knowing specific items we needed to replace, but did not even know where to begin to find what would work best for our home, with things we already have and want to keep. She asked questions, REALLY listened, and that's where her innate creativity kicked in. She has "nailed it" time after time with unique suggestions, and I look forward to working with her again as we update this home. I have not seen this 5 star level of customer service that Ashley delivers in a long time, and Ethan Allen is fortunate to have this jewel! And we LOVE our new pieces - the quality is wonderful, too! Thank you Ashley!  Lisa Bice

resp.text: Wow, Lisa thank you for this awesome review! We couldn't agree more. Ashley is amazing! We love hearing how appreciated her design service was and that you're home came together beautifully. We strive for quality products and try to ensure our clients receive nothing short of perfection. Thank you for working with us!

When we asked them about it they told us they are universal screws!  Go to Lowes or Home Depot and ask for universal furniture screws!  Called corporate no help! Don't waste your time. Called Peach Tree, GA and they ordered what i needed in 3 minutes.If you want Ethan Allen go to Peach Tree, GA.  If you want better service go to Wal-Mart.

Shane

name: Amy Johnston
text: Pricey. Not a great selection.

resp.text:
Thank you Amy for taking the time to leave a review. Ethan Allen is high end furniture and intended to last, we stand by our quality and craftsmanship, this is where you see the difference in the pricing from us to the other brands. The pricing is in line with the high end market for these reasons. We offer a complimentary design service with talented professional designers who are there to help as much or as little as you would like. We also offer Great, flexible finance options. Ethan Allen is always working to stay relevant with the trends but keeping our classic options still available, introducing new introductions every few months.

We appreciate you taking the time to visit our Design Center and wish you luck on you search for the right selections for your home!

name: Olivia Hardy
text: My husband went to the back to buy a blower unit for the inside part of our A/C. When he got there he found out that they don't sell them as a unit like they used to. You have to buy just the motor, so that's what he bought. When he gets it home, he finds out that it didn't have mount brackets so I went up there to get one that does. I was then told that none of the motors come with bracket mounts. I made the comment that he should have told my husband that so he could have gotten it while he was there. It's hot and this is our A/C unit we're trying to fix in the middle of a hot day. The gentleman said it wasn't his job to know what a person knew or not. I told him that he knew more than my husband on what parts come with what, that's when a woman came around counter and said that she was the owner and that I didn't need to talk to her employee that way. I wasn't being rude or belligerent. I just didn't think it would have been that hard to ask if the customer knew it didn't come with bracket mounts, especially if he brought an older model in. This will be the last time my family and I will be back to that store and before today, I would have recommended that store to anyone. Now I'll tell people to stay away. It's nothing like it used to be.

resp.text:
Mrs. Hardy,
You did not speak to the owner for I am the owner, and I was at another store that day, you spoke to a co-worker, but Mrs. Hardy we have no idea what a customer's needs are until they inform us.
There are hundreds of units, and they change models every year, and the servicemen have to request what they need from us. We are a supply house, not a service company, and we are sorry that your husband did not realize he need additional products, but that was his call and not ours. Your husband was servicing his own unit.
We try and make all customers happy, and were sorry that you were disappointed, but do realize we have no idea what is wrong with a central unit until a serviceman request a particular part.

name: AK _SAVAGE

I have walked out all these times because of this one thing calles "ACKNOWLEDGEMENT". Iknow these workers do not live in a multi million dollar home but what gives them the right to act all high and mighty. Each time i have gone thinking maybe this time someone will at least say "Hello, welcome. Is thier anything I can help you with?" Nothing! You have no idea whether people have money to spend there or not and refardless you should treat people with cimmon courtesy. It is not alot to ask. text: The day of, the associate called and confirmed and asked if I could have the space cleared for a more efficient delivery. I did just that! But after I had donated my old room furniture, I received a call stating I would not get my new furniture due to the delivery truck breaking down. I was livid because I have a fully breastfed 8 month old and we now have to sleep on the floor. Surely I couldn't feed her in the middle of the night on a sofa. After explaining that to the manager he simply said "well, things happen". He did not offer any extra assistance. I offered to pick up the furniture myself and have 2 gentlemen ride with me to put it together because I was the last delivery for the day. I brainstormed solutions and he simply said no. He did not offer compensation for my inconvenience, NOTHING. The day of the delivery, the young man delivering my furniture was very sweet, professional and because I could not be there to observe their proficiency and accuracy,

text:
We don't hire veterans?

We don't hire veterans.

name: Mark Froemming
text: We recently purchased some Newport Collection pieces for our beach house and had the pleasure of working with Cynthia Duke.  We had seen print ads for Summer Classics but had never really known much about the product.  Fortunately Cynthia was working the day we visited the showroom.  She was very knowledgeable about the different collections, and quickly gained our trust.  She has a very positive attitude and it is apparent she loves what she does and is very invested in her customer relationships.  We spent almost two hours with her and never expended her patience.  After listening to us and showing us many collections, we decided on the Newport Collection.   While expensive, Cynthia showed us the quality of design and construction of the Summer Classics products;  and we proceeded to order a sofa, two chairs, two ottomans, two side tables, a coffee table, and multiple pillows and bolsters.   Several weeks later we called Cynthia for another Summer Classic solution.  We needed two window bench cushions and she solved the problem immediately, ordering two custom dimension cushions with a Sunbrella fabric unique to Summer Classics!   Cynthia is a “rock star” and I have recommended her to friends.   She is a great asset to Summer Classics and we look forward to working with her in the future for further outdoor furniture needs.  I highly recommend her!  Mark Froemming

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Tammy Price
text:
Thanks to Summer Classics & especially Cynthia Duke, we now feel like we live at a resort! We looked at several different brands before we decided to go with Summer Classics for our outdoor spaces. The other brands were a bit less expensive, but when we learned about the quality & the way that Summer Classics stands behind their name, the decision was so easy.

Cynthia is a wealth of knowledge & so much fun to be around! She assured me that certain pieces would in fact fit perfectly in our spaces & she was exactly right! When we had a couple of hiccups, she went above & beyond to make sure the problems were solved & that we were happy. She always tells me with a smile that she loves her job & it shows! I feel like I went in looking for outdoor furniture & came out with a new friend!

We couldn't be happier with our Rustic wicker mixed with Croquet teak! Thank you Summer Classics & thank you Cynthia for helping to put the finishing touches on our gorgeous outdoor living areas!

name: EVERYTHING CHILDERS
text:
On Tuesday, my last shopping Pier 1 businesses ended in Jones Valley.
Gave both locations great support.  However...the Jones Valley stop CSR's had been polite & answered questions...but wouldn't help gather my large quantity of items. I had to gather, lift, & carry them.
Following Spine & Hip injections, this was strain to my back & painful. Afterwards, I struggled walking. The associate permitted me to use their plastic cart. After leaving, I was complaining to myself, as I crossed the street to my car. A lady, carrying Bath & Body bag, crossed as well. I commented about the associates at the store being lazy.
As that person went on. I loaded my things & was leaving the cart on the grass.  The lady in the parking area yelled & demanded I return the cart. I didn't fully understand. So, I asked again what she said. She made her demand on me about 3 times.
I asked her if she worked there? She said yes.  I asked if she was a Manager? She said Yes!
I tried to tell her about the laziness I was dealing with.
She became irritated with me. No peaceful problem solving was enacted.
She came hurriedly at me. I asked her to stop. I warned her, she was crossing the line.  She came anyways, within inches of me, calling me lazy, grabbed my cart without my permission, & proceeded to the store, being loud, calling me lazy repeatedly, & told me to never step foot in her store again!
She definitely broke the Covid rules, & came to close to me besides, causes me to feel uncomfortable.
I requested the 911 service & filed a report.
The Manager, should have been more professional.  She ordered me to never come back & she don't have to worry.  I don't want to!!!
All I can say is remember when shopping at the Jones Valley location, to take help for you, because they are not much help.  And watch out for the Quick Tempered Manager.
It's 4 AM & my Spine & hip still hurt.  This  is a shame!
🥺😢

name: Joshua Trotter
text: Was not able to purchase my items. Store did not have sufficient change for my transaction so I was told to come back at a later date. So what your telling me is that it is two weeks before Christmas, the store has been open for several hours and you don't have change for a hundred dollar bill? Why would you even open up for business without change to operate with? How many other paying customers were unable to make a cash purchase?  Staff was rude and the store manager would not even come out of the back room to talk with me? Good luck Pier 1...

text: I haven’t even visited this store yet but I already appreciate their honesty. I called to find someone to come light the pilot light to my gas logs; I waited until the day before the predicted big snow of 2019. I was advised to wait until it could be properly serviced since I had not used the gas logs in years. I was told that they always clean the gas logs and do a safety check before lighting the logs. I was very appreciative of their concern for my safety and agreed to wait to have my gas logs cleaned, inspected, and then lit.

text: Alabama Gas Light and Grill has a knowledgeable staff and carries high quality grills and accessories.   I bought our MHP gas grill there a few years ago and it's been extremely durable. They also carry a variety of charcoal grills and smoking accessories including a good selection of wood chunks for smoke flavoring.    Support your local business and economy by buying from small businesses like this and get better products and support.

name: Deirdre Taylor
text: I only go to home Depot if Lowe's doesn't have what I need, and that's rare. I always have a problem picking up orders. You can't just call in to have it brought to you by curbside because they claim to be too busy to get your information. When you go in, if the order is not in that little closet behind them, they'll just tell you it's not there rather than to go to the back and get it. I order a lot and never have a problem with Lowe's. It took an act of congress to finally get my complete order from Home Depot. One young lady, Kia went out of her way to help me and it wasn't even her department. Thanks to her I have everything. I only shop here when I absolutely have no choice.

name: Silvery Nova
text: The first problem is the delivery service company that Home Depot uses for direct deliveries,Central Transport. My 1st initial delivery date changed three time before it was actually attempted to be delivered on March 3rd. On March 3rd the shipment came on a long bed truck with a pallet dolly. My shipment is a pallet of 33 boxes of porcelain tile., plus 7 additional boxes they put on the same pallet. The right side of the pallet was coming apart due to the immense weight of the tile . The driver could not move the pallet down the truck. He was not going to be able to pull it up the small slope on my driveway. What on earth were they even thinking?They needed a fork lift. I called Home Depot and they got the Transport company on the line while I was on hold. I ended up being told the transport company needed to take care of this and they would contact me in 24 to 48 hours. Which they never did. I had to call them. On 3/5 Friday I called central transport and they told me the shipment would be delivered on Monday between 11 and 12. They never showed. I checked the shipment tracking and found that they changed it to Tuesday 3/9! I got no call, text, or phone call.So Tuesday 3/9 I message them to find out eta. They said the drivers hadn't left yet and to keep checking they will update me. That never happened. So I wait and wait and I get a call from Home Depot letting me know the tile has arrived at THE STORE. I was never told anything about this.They will be delivering the tile on Monday 3/15....

name: Sandra Cauley
text:
I went in the garden center and told girl at registry, that  I wanted 2 medium bags of Miracle-Gro potting soil, and help getting it n putting it in car.  No help came, then she told me go in back pick it up.  Finally realized she charged me for garden soil, I ask her to give me potting soil and charge me for the difference.  She said she couldn't, I had go customer service.  I told her I wasn't able, that why I parked out in front garden center and ask for help.  I told her I would eat the loss and never come there again.

I don't like be hard get long with, but it was her mistake, why should I have go customer service, when I have trouble walking that distance.  I will use Lowes from now on.

I'm a 100% Service Connected Disable Veteran.

name: melissa renee
text: The lady who sold us a washer and dryer was very nice no problems at all. I have a problem with the fact that they were supposed to be delivered at my house on April 21st. It got delayed so they moved the delivery date to Today ( April 24th ) but I never got any notification so I called and they told me that they don’t deliver to my area on saturdays, only Wednesdays and they don’t deliver when the weather is rainy. It’s been SUNNY all day. No bad weather AT ALL. Now the delivery date has been moved to May 12th. I will be giving birth in May so that’s really annoying 🙄 I ordered my washer and dryer on MARCH 3RD!!!  I hope the warehouse manager makes this right.

name: Jessie
text: Went to buy an appliance that I saw online. Called the this particular store literally on my way over there. Young lady told me that indeed they had the sale item which I was inquiring about. I get to the store and spoke with someone worker in appliances I ask him again to verify of what I wanted. He walks back and confirms my injury. Rung me up just to realize he mentioned through conversation of the appliance he thought I was asking of. Which I corrected him and pointed out and literally touched again the same appliances that I wanted. Apparently some way some how after all this confusion. They magically had sold out. So my thinking leads me to believe the person I spoke to on the phone didn't bother to check or maybe something with system either way wasted my time and here's the kicker the way the guy tried to put it was like I could go to another home depot after I already paid. Luckily my bank released this debit transaction. Poor poor salesmanship and somewhere along the line communication is lacking. I hope I can revisit this location in the future without this issue.

name: Robyn Curry
text:
**EDIT**
Since the freezer mishap below the management staff (namely Dave) has gone above and beyond to make things right by me. I feel like The Home Depot has redeemed themselves and they have earned my business once again.

I ordered an upright freezer to be delivered to my home. I missed three days of work for no-show deliveries and countless hours on the phone trying to get a freezer delivered and all I got in return was excuses and finger pointing. I had three managers from the West Mobile location involved in this situation (Dave, Cameron, and Jonathan) as well as the customer service help line. They were all aware of the fiasco that had occurred with this delivery yet when I asked what could be done no solution was offered. After a month of no freezer from the Home Depot I cancelled the order and bought one from Lowe’s. I had it the very next day. The Home Depot was always my go-to home improvement store but in light of the lack of customer service in this particular situation I think I’ll reconsider that.

name: Shaun Steffensen
text:
If you order appliances from somewhere, do yourself a favor and not order from Home Depot. First, the people who are selling the appliances do not know much about them. I was told that for installation of my microwave, I needed an outlet in the wall that it was being installed on. Great. I'm good. WRONG!!! The outlet had to be above the microwave.... Something that would have been nice to know, but they could not communicate that properly.
Then, the delivery/installation people had no idea what they were doing. They were more of a delivery company, not an installation professional. They could not install my gas range. They damaged my microwave. So, really, they weren't even a good delivery company. Home Depot just subs out delivery to the cheapest company....and you can see the quality when your damaged items arrive!
And I pray for you if you have ANY problems with your delivery or installation!!!
Count on a couple of things: 1) You will spend hours on the phone getting to talk to the right person. Once you think that you have the right person, they will tell you they have to check on something and they will have to call you back. OR, the right person is "on lunch" and they will call you back. After giving them ample time for "lunch" (3 hours) when you call them back, you will be told that they were "off today" but they will return your call in the morning.
Basically, it's a game of ping-pong and it takes days to get simple questions answered because, obviously, no one who works there wants to actually do anything.
I can't believe I dropped over $7K in there and they can't even answer a simple question!!!!
Buyer beware!!! Shop at Lowe's!!!

name: Lacey Paquin
text: I ordered $1,600 worth of appliances on black Friday to furnish my investment property. I scheduled them to be delivered on Friday, 12/22, and I was told the delivery time frame would be from 2pm-6pm. I planned accordingly and the my appliances were never delivered! No CALL or anything. It took me 4 different phone calls to reach an actual person. The delivery people could not be reached. I waited at the property until 10pm. I went to the store the next day and spoke with the manager, and apparently I was the 3rd customer complaining of no delivery and no notification. The store could not reach the delivery service because they were closed, and would not re-open again until that Tuesday after Christmas. I was told they "might" start calling customers then to attempt to re-schedule deliveries. I found this to be completely unprofessional and unacceptable. I cancelled my order and was refunded my money. I am showing my rental Wednesday and it will be empty. Home Depot has hurt my business.

text: Unfortunately I had been shopping with lowes. It had been on more than occasions than not a terrible experience. I decided to try Home Depot in my recent purchase of a bathtub. Within the first 5 minutes of being inside the store I was greeted by 4 associates. All of which were very welcoming and friendly none of which I have ever experienced at lowes. They pointed me in the direction I needed to go. Upon my arrival of the bath tub isles another associate was there eager and ready to assist me. He opened the merchandise and checked for defects and everything to my satisfaction. None of which I have ever experienced at lowes. Even on the way to check out associates asked if there was anything more they could do to help. Overall my experience at Home Depot was outstanding. I work in customer service and a lot of places lack in that department. Job well done!

text: Tara was great. She was so patient and helpful. Made the decision process so easy. Beautiful lights to choose from and if they don't have it, they'll find it. Wonderful experience.

text:
Sales lady came across as kind of cold and didn't want to be there. Understandable on Saturday but you can't let your customers know that. Took my special order for an item that I already had the order # for. I td her I wanted to look at floodlights also. She just said "they are around the corner" and pointed. Then she just left me on my own.
Other than that they have tons of lights on display to look at as always.

text: Very friendly staff helped me find just the right light. Thank you so much!

name: Tasha Wiley
text: They are Super honest, and will bend over backwards to help you find a solution. I love that they can easily research and order any specialty bulbs you may need. They will always take care of issues that may arise (ie, a sconce breaks 4 years after you purchased it and you have no idea how to find replacement glass—they’ve got you in the system and they will order it for you!) Top notch service, and everyone is so friendly. You get what you pay for, and we are always happy with our purchases from Richards Lighting.

name: Rod Powell
text:
Outstanding business.

They were the lighting provider for our newly constructed home.

We had a "lighting allowance" from our builder, so we went to pick out each and every light fixture for our home.

Expecting this to be tedious at best, we were very pleasantly surprised by both the selection, and especially the young lady who assisted us.

She was very knowledgeable about every item we had questions about, and she was able to make many great recommendations based on our tastes.

Best experience with the various vendors involved in our build.

Would gladly do business with Richards again.

name: Kristian Starlin
text: Their technician is very knowledgeable,  annnddd he's pretty cute.

name: Aaron Biggs
text: Wonderful service and fantastic selection!!  My wife and I spent the evening with Terra who is amazing.  She helped us pick out the entire lighting selection for the farmhouse we are building.  Great experience and we couldn't be happier.  Thanks Terra!!

name: Kelley K
text: Richards Lighting is always wonderful when we go in...no matter what you need they are always willing to help.  We personally work with Mike. His knowledge and expertise always makes us feel confident in the choices made!  Thank You!

text: Went to Richards Lighting for a new kitchen light and was amazing on the selection. They definitely have your lighting needs covered

name: Carolyn Pancharian
text: Richard's is outstanding. They ask if you need help or prefer to browse. No salesman pressure. When we found what we wanted we told Sabine. Next we paid the bill & a gentleman was already there with our purchase and put it in our car. We appreciate how fast & smooth everything went.  So upon arriving at home we ordered a second lamp. Thanks for the fantastic service. Carolyn Pancharian.

name: Kareen Goodwin
text: Beth was great!!! Made it enjoyable.

name: Terri Womack
text: Very happy purchase today!

name: Jennifer Shepard
text: We purchased all our lighting fixtures from Richard’s for our new custom house. They have a beautiful selection and their service is top notch. We had a few little issues, at no fault of Richard’s, but Mike and his staff took care of me every step of the way. They definitely understand customer service and the power of repeat business. When the time comes to finish our basement, we will definitely be using Richard’s again.

name: BJ F
text: Initially I thought this place was great. They had a huge selection. I paid a hefty price for several light fixtures and a fan. I didn't mind at all as I was supporting a local business. But that's where it went downhill! Customer service is definitely not their top priority once the transaction is complete.. Perhaps they're more inclined to accommodate builders, but they definitely didn't help solve my issue at all. Beth never called me back when she said she would. I've yet to speak with her again. I had to call about a light kit that I ordered a month prior and was told it would be another couple of months before it came in if that even happened at all. I was refunded the wrong amount initially and had to call again to get it corrected. I still need to order several more lights to complete our renovations, but I will definitely be taking my business elsewhere!

name: H B
text:
Awesome company to work with. Got our new house lighting from them with no issues.

Selection is good but the real selling point is their service. Terry and everyone else there is helpful, nice and always willing to assist in any way.

I definitely plan on using them for any future lighting we may have at the house.

name: Alysha Bolin
text: Terra is GREAT she helped me create a wishlist and narrow down which lights I needed for a new build. I bought all the lights for my new house here and after a transaction issue on their end I will not go back for how I was treated!! Teresa spoke very ugly to me over the phone about an issue that was their problem, so after supporting this business and being talked to like that I will not recommend this business!!

name: Brian Pouliot
text: Huge selection of lighting fixtures and a knowledgeable and helpful staff. There are so many options when building a house, and Richard's made it easier for us to get what we wanted and stay in our budget.

text: Not only does Richard's lighting have an incredible variety of lighting options - I mean REALLY incredible, their staff is knowledgeable and friendly. One thing you might not know, is that they also do lamp repair, which was important to me when my vintage brass floor lamp's on/off dimmer control stopped working. They took it in, cared for it and returned it in great working condition at a great price. I love this lamp - it has been passed on to me from my family.

name: M. J. Cothran
text: Ive taken valuable family lamps for rewiring to Palmers. They have done excellent work and always been courteous and knowledgeable. I have another lamp there now.

name: Rex Roach
text: I'm a bit surprised by the negative review. I live in Opelika and spoke with Sandra on the phone. She was super helpful and walked me through getting the exact shade I need for an antique floor lamp. Nice folks. Got what I want. Good price. What more could you ask?

name: Deborah
text: Mr Palmer is one of the most professional people I know. Extremely helpful and quite charming. A delight to do business with anytime.

name: Linda fiore
text: I took a lamp to this store and he was so rude! The lady knows nothing and when she called him from the back area he walks up like I am bothering him.  He said my lamp was garbage and could not be fixed and "I can't do nothing with these thing" were his exact words.  I took it too another lamp store and they were able to fix it.  Said they have customers a lot come to them after he insults everyone. There is no customer service there. I will never go back and tell my friends and family the same. I really don't know how this place stays in business.  RATING * VERY BAD!!!!

name: Lillie Coleman
text: I had a very bad experience with Palmer Lamps in Homewood. He was very nasty and rude to me to the point of disbelief. I returned to the shop about a week after picking up a lamp he rewired. I had called earlier and told them that my lamp had been cut off at the top and it now had a crack in it. He and the others in the shop refused to look at it and accused me of trying to get something out of him.  He told me that he measured the lamp when I brought it in; but when I asked him to let me see my ticket with the measurement on it, he refused and said he threw it away.He told me to get out of his shop with the piece of trash not worth $50 or he would call the police. When I initially took the lamp to him, He and the lady in the shop told me what a beautiful antique I had and could probably get $125 for it.  I told him it meant a lot to me and I did'nt want to sell it. Now he tells me that I have a worthless piece of trash and he's not doing anything about the damage his shop caused?

name: Tracy Strickland
text: Very helpful and knowledgeable
